column1: Little Goat Diner////Our food came quickly which was great.  I kept on getting hungry looking at the food waiting to be taken to the hungry diners.  After some obligitory pictures of our food we dug in.  Seriously
column2: the Sloppy Goat was so good I don't think I will be able to eat another "sloppy Joe" again.  My friend created her own chili mac if you will which looked amazing.  I am kind of surprised that it is not on the menu for the cold winter days in Chicago.  I would buy it all the time.
